Introduction

Remi (Korean: 레미; Japanese: レミ) is a Japanese singer and dancer formerly under FNC Entertainment and FNC W. She was a member and the Main Dancer and Sub Vocalist of the South Korean girl group Cherry Bullet.

On January 21, 2019, she made her official debut as a member of the South Korean girl group Cherry Bullet with the single mini album "Let's Play Cherry Bullet" with "Q & A" serving as the title track.
